BULK RUN CONFIGURATION SCHEMA
==============================

TOP-LEVEL STRUCTURE:
  {
    "runs": [              // Array of run configurations
      { /* run config */ },
      { /* run config */ }
    ]
  }

EACH RUN CONFIGURATION:
  Same as single run schema (see 'repobird examples schema run')

BULK-SPECIFIC BEHAVIOR:
  • Processes runs sequentially by default
  • Continues on individual run failures
  • Provides summary of all runs at completion
  • Supports --dry-run for validation

EXAMPLE:
  repobird examples generate bulk     # Generate bulk example
  repobird bulk config.json --dry-run # Validate bulk config
